Title: Establishing communism is the shared goal of our struggle
Publisher: Zhong-Su youhao xiehui zonghui (Head Office of the Sino-Soviet Friendship Association) (中苏友好协会总会)
Notes: A Russian and a Chinese embrace. On the left, the Yangzi River bridge near Wuhan, built with Soviet support and completed in 1957 (the year this poster was published), two years ahead of schedule. The poster was published by the Sino-Soviet Friendship Association.
Theme: Sino-Soviet CooperationThe Yangzi River Bridge in Wuhan
